abstract: After hunting for three months, Facebook hired the former chief financial officer of Genentech as its C.F.O., a move that is likely to reignite chatter about a possible I.P.O.
snippet: After hunting for three months, Facebook hired the former chief financial officer of Genentech as its C.F.O., a move that is likely to reignite chatter about a possible I.P.O.
lead_paragraph: After hunting for three months, Facebook hired the former chief financial officer of Genentech as its C.F.O., a move that is likely to reignite chatter about a possible initial public offering for the social network powerhouse.
